tasks.label: Backend
tasks.command: cd esthesis-server && mvn install && cd esthesis-server-impl && mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.jvmArguments="-Xdebug -XX:+ShowCodeDetailsInExceptionMessages -Xrunjdwp:transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=46001" -Dspring-boot.run.arguments="--server.port=46000"

tasks.label: Frontend
tasks.command: cd esthesis-ui && npm install --force && npx ng serve --host 0.0.0.0 --disable-host-check --proxy-config proxy.conf.json
